title: when they ban my favorite champion.

replies.body:
He says, OK.
Gnar says: Okay
you see, there's a great deal of difference.
from that i can tell you don play rammus very often.

I think i have a screen-capture of every single time Gnar was ban.
and I can count on my fingers, still, he is pop enough... i just never had to lane against a Gnar in a "normal" game, but I don't play a lot of normal game.
still, played as Gnar mid against a Cassiopeia, venom is not good for you health you know.
but since it was bronze, i won, despise having died over and over again against her.
I saw someone ban Lissandra, and it baffled me. She hasn't been OP since like 2014

I faced lissandra once while playing with gnar one another account in another server.
despise my mood problems, it was a very chill lane phase.
Hasn't happened to me in 2 years. Not sure what that tells you

you play mordekaiser?
well... i think people forget about bad rulers.
just look for fernando de collor mello.
hum.. no need for that, just check your local politics.
